name: The Gate Keeper (Blockhead Manic)
description:
WARNING: THERES NO UPGRADES, BUT WILL UPDATE IT SOON! Story:

You play as Azrael, the angel, who is tasked as the GATE KEEPER for the Unrepented are trying to get to heaven through the Gates. Stop the UNREPENTER and let in the REPENTERS. How? with a The HOLY CROSSBOW! that shoots crosses (of course). Be careful not to hit the REPENTERS or you will be fall too. 

May God be with you :)

How to Play:

Use WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

use left mouse button to aim and shoot crosses, you have a second reload time, but you can increase it with upgrades! (Use your score to buy upgrades!)

Don't let the red Unrepented Get through the gates and let the green Repented in

Credits:

Programmer: Blockhead Manic

Artist: Blockhead Manic and Buyana114

Composer: Buyana114

Hope you enjoy!

-Blockhead Manic
